column1: 712311,Sheetmetal Worker (Second Class),,"Align parts or work pieces for assembly
column3: Cut industrial materials in preparation for fabrication or processing
column5: Disassemble equipment for maintenance or repair
column7: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column9: Heat material or work pieces to prepare for or complete production
column15: Mark products, work pieces or equipment with identifying information
column17: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column19: Monitor equipment operation to ensure no flaws
column21: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column23: Mount materials or work pieces onto production equipment
column31: Remove accessories, tools or other parts from equipment
column35: Select production equipment according to product specifications
column37: Set equipment guides, stops, spacers or other fixtures
column43: Sort materials or products for processing, storing, shipping or grading",nan
